Abdominal Radiology.title: CT Angiography or CT Enterography - GI Bleed
Abdominal Radiology.description: This CT angiography or CT enterography structured report template was created by members of the Society of Abdominal Radiology GI Bleeding Disease-Focused Panel. Instructions for using this template are included throughout the document. The purpose of this template is to provide a framework for reporting CT angiography or CT enterography in patients with GI bleeding. This template should be modified to comply with individual institutional requirements.
Abdominal Radiology.author: rsna_00005112
references: Gastrointestinal Bleeding at CT Angiography and CT Enterography: Imaging Atlas and Glossary of Terms Flavius F. Guglielmo, Michael L. Wells, David H. Bruining, Lisa L. Strate, Álvaro Huete, Avneesh Gupta, Jorge A. Soto, Brian C. Allen, Mark A. Anderson, Olga R. Brook, Michael S. Gee, David J. Grand, Martin L. Gunn, Ashish Khandelwal, Seong Ho Park, Vijay Ramalingam, Farnoosh Sokhandon, Don C. Yoo,  Jeff L. Fidler, MD RadioGraphics 2021:41(6) https://doi.org/10.1148/rg.2021210043
